We may obtain information about the device you are using (OS, advertisement ID, name of computer, language setting, etc.).
We may also refer to your Cookie information and obtain your access history, etc. for marketing purposes such as displaying advertisement targeting user activities.

We may also link obtained information to internal identifier given to you by us.
